mapper.sql: id, dict_key, dict_name, order_num, enabled, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, remark
mapper.select: select dt.id as dictId, dt.dict_key as dictKey, dt.dict_name as dictName, dt.enabled as dictEnabled, dt.order_num as dictNum, dt.remark as dictRemark, dv.id as dictValueId, dv.dict_type_id as dictTypeId, dv.dict_value_key as dictValueKey, dv.dict_value_name as dictValueName, dv.enabled as dictValueEnabled, dv.order_num as dictValueNum, dv.remark as dictValueRemark from sys_dict_type dt left join sys_dict_value dv on dt.id = dv.dict_type_id where dt.deleted = 0 and dt.enabled = 'Y' and dv.enabled = 'Y' and dt.dict_key = #{dictKey} order by dv.order_num asc

select dt.id as dictId, dt.dict_key as dictKey, dt.dict_name as dictName, dt.enabled as dictEnabled, dt.order_num as dictNum, dt.remark as dictRemark, dv.id as dictValueId, dv.dict_type_id as dictTypeId, dv.dict_value_key as dictValueKey, dv.dict_value_name as dictValueName, dv.enabled as dictValueEnabled, dv.order_num as dictValueNum, dv.remark as dictValueRemark from sys_dict_type dt left join sys_dict_value dv on dt.id = dv.dict_type_id
AND dt.dict_key like CONCAT('%',#{dictKey},'%')
AND dt.dict_key like CONCAT('%',#{dictName},'%')
dt.deleted = 0
order by dv.order_num asc

select dt.id as dictId, dt.dict_key as dictKey, dt.dict_name as dictName, dt.enabled as dictEnabled, dt.order_num as dictNum, dt.remark as dictRemark, dv.id as dictValueId, dv.dict_type_id as dictTypeId, dv.dict_value_key as dictValueKey, dv.dict_value_name as dictValueName, dv.enabled as dictValueEnabled, dv.order_num as dictValueNum, dv.remark as dictValueRemark from sys_dict_type dt left join sys_dict_value dv on dt.id = dv.dict_type_id where dt.deleted = 0 and dt.enabled = 'Y' and dv.enabled = 'Y' order by dv.order_num asc
